definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke

sentences.english: But in fact, hookahs are far from safe.
sentences.chinese: 但事實上，水煙一點都不健康。

sentences.english: Simplicity Chow produced a miniature hookah and offered it to Benevolence.
sentences.chinese: 趙樸齋取一支水煙筒送上善卿。

sentences.english: College towns in particular have reported a marked increase in hookah bars over the past five years.
sentences.chinese: 過去五年裏，大學城內水煙吧的增長尤爲明顯。

sentences.english: That study also found that the water in hookahs filters out less than 5 percent of the nicotine.
sentences.chinese: 該研究還發現水煙中的水只能過濾掉5%的尼古丁。

sentences.english: Tourists relax in a nargile (hookah, shisha) den in Beirut.
sentences.chinese: 貝魯特，在阿拉伯水煙房裏休息的遊客。

sentences.english: He dreams of scaffolds as he smokes his hookah pipe.
sentences.chinese: 他抽起水煙筒，夢想着斷頭臺。

sentences.english: Not even swine flu could come between Egyptians and their shisha , it seemed.
sentences.chinese: 然而似乎豬流感也不能影響埃及人和水煙之間的關係。

sentences.english: Water pipe In Guangxi province, so many people are the pumping smokers.
sentences.chinese: 水煙筒》在廣西見到最多的就是抽這種水煙的人。

sentences.english: Water pipe In Guangxi province, so many people are the pumping smokers.
sentences.chinese: 水煙筒》在廣西見到最多的就是抽這種水煙的人。

sentences.english: Some can accommodate as many as 400 patrons.
sentences.chinese: 一些水煙酒吧可以容納近400人。

sentences.english: Local governments, too, are moving to stem rising interest in hookahs.
sentences.chinese: 地方政府對監管水煙這事也越來越有興趣。

definition: The Surging Waves Pavillion in Suzhou, Jiangsu
to lie in disarray/to cut across/to traverse
rouge and powder/(fig.) the fair sex
beautiful silk fabrics/person in beautiful silk dress
(literary) to practice medicine/to work as a pharmacist
